instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.R7151: What is R7151? Current sense resistor between battery current sense shunt resistor and ISL6259. When these resistors fail the ISL6259 cannot gauge how much current is being sent to or drawn from the battery, which will cause the ISL6259 to stop drawing/sending power to the battery as a safety precaution. Symptoms are low voltage on PPBUS_G3H, quarter fan spin, boot looping, or battery not charging..
definitions.R7152: What is R7152? Current sense resistor between battery current sense shunt resistor and ISL6259. When these resistors fail the ISL6259 cannot gauge how much current is being sent to or drawn from the battery, which will cause the ISL6259 to stop drawing/sending power to the battery as a safety precaution. Symptoms are low voltage on PPBUS_G3H, quarter fan spin, boot looping, or battery not charging..
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .
definitions.ISL6259: What is ISL6259? This is a charging chip for Macbook motherboards from 2010 through 2015.
definitions.SMC_BC_ACOK: What is SMC_BC_ACOK? This is identical to CHGR_ACOK. This will come out of the ISL6258 or ISL6259 charging chip when CHGR_ACIN & CHGR_DCIN are present, and is necessary for the onewire circuit to begin working. On most Macbooks, CHGR_ACOK needs to be present in order for PP3V42_G3H to flow to the onewire circuit so that the circuitry that allows the charger to communicate with the SMC will turn on.  .
definitions.U5000: What is U5000? This is the System Management Controller(SMC) in macbooks from 2013-2015.
definitions.A1466: What is A1466? A1466 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Early 2015, 2017, Mid 2012, Mid 2013, Early 2014 with EMC 2925, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00165, 820-3209, 820-3437..

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-02 - Don't charge / Low Green Light
threads.message:
The computer works fine without battery, but when i plug the battery the the computer start and shutdown (restart) in loop also dont hold the battery
I tried another battery (new) no lucky.
I tried new IO and Cable no lucky
I get very low green light.

<CAPACITOR>C7112</CAPACITOR>-13-14-17 = 8V

<TRANSISTOR>Q7155</TRANSISTOR>:
Pin 5: 8v
Pin 4: 1.1v
Pin 3: 8v
Pin 2: 8v
Pin 1: 8v

<RESISTOR>R7152</RESISTOR>: 8v
<RESISTOR>R7151</RESISTOR>: 5v

<TRANSISTOR>Q7130</TRANSISTOR> With battery plugged without charger:
1 = 0
2-3-4 = 8v

I think my problem is <CAPACITOR>C3080</CAPACITOR> (battery and chager plugged):
Pin 1: Drop 5 to 2 Loop
Pin 4: Drop 8 to 7 Loop
Pin 3: 4V
Pin 2: 4v





Did you guys have any idea?

Thank you
